Texts.Eng:
While dark magic is scary these tiny horses can only use light, and apparently powerful, magic, literally.

Diet: ^green;Herbivore^reset;

^orange;Perks^reset;:
Skilled: +^green;30^reset;% Energy, +^green;15^reset;% Damage & Energy Regen
Resist: +^green;40^reset;% Cosmic
 
^orange;Environment^reset;:
In Lush, Jungle, Primeval, Forest and Savannah biomes, +^green;10^reset;% Energy, +^green;3^reset;% Speed & Jump and +^green;10^reset;% Physical Resist.
Lose ^red;34^reset;% Energy Regen and ^red;20^reset;% Damage & Energy in Alien, Heck or fleshy biomes.

^orange;Weapons^reset;:

Wands: +^green;8^reset;% Resistance, +^green;25^reset;% Energy Regen
Staves: +^green;10^reset;% Damage, +^green;5^reset;% Crit Chance
Energy: +^green;15^reset;% Damage

^red;Weaknesses^reset;:

Weak: ^red;50^reset;% Shadow, ^red;15^reset;% Radiation
Frail: -^red;30^reset;% Armor Protection
